Control.ttp: zhThis page is used for maintaining information related to 'Network Settings'.
zhClick to display online help related to this page...
zhClick to save the contents of this page to the current device...
zhClick to refresh the contents of this page...
zhClick to reset the contents of this page to what it was after the last save...

Messages.Message:
zhIf you select the other Network Interface Controller (NIC), all unsaved changes made to the current NIC will be discarded.

OK to discard the changes and select the other NIC?

zhAttempting to reconnect to new local IP Address: '{0}'...
Please wait.
zhPlease wait while the changes to the NIC take effect...

zhPlease wait while the Network Connection is changed from
'{0}' to '{1}'...

zhCould not reconnect to IP Address: '{0}'

After closing this dialog, try typing the following directly into
this browser's address bar: {1}...
zh'IP Address' is required and must contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Subnet Mask' is required and must contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Default Gateway' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Primary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Secondary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Primary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.
zh'Secondary DNS' must either be empty or contain a valid 'ip address' when Network Connection is set to 'Static'.

zhIt is highly recommended that the PAC be rebooted to finalize changes made to the Network Settings.

Click 'Yes' to reboot the PAC now or click 'No' if you prefer to reboot it later...
